summary: Seeking a setting to expand on and use my sales and management experience; I have a strong track record of exceptional customer service, pro-active business strategies and award-winning sales. My passion is leading teams to success through employee engagement, and I look forward to using my marketing and sales skills to grow with your team.

experience.title: District Manager
experience.description: Oversaw 6 early childhood education centers in Long Island, NY; focused on improving financial results, program quality, brand recognition, and employee engagement. Achievements include moving two centers from negative EBITA to positive EBITA within 12 months; opened a new center in fall 2014; guided five centers toward NAEYC accreditation.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Directed Tutor Time child care center; oversaw health, welfare, diet, and nurture; curriculum and program development; recruiting, training and supervising staff; planned activities and learning; maintained records; held NYS child care license. Increased revenue and enrollment; reduced labor and expenses through effective management.

experience.title: Area Manager
experience.description: Oversaw nine franchise-owned schools; collected monthly financial reports and conducted audits; managed budgets and enrollment goals; evaluated centers for brand standards; reviewed monthly director reports and approved school newsletters; supported licensing compliance; addressed parent complaints; set marketing goals and supported touring and enrollment.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Directed the child care center; cared for health, welfare, diet and nurture; curriculum and program development; recruiting, training, and supervising staff; planning and leading activities; maintaining records as required; wrote grants and organized fundraisers and trainings; maintained licenses.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Taught science, math, computers and art to 6th-8th graders; wrote lesson plans; planned projects; monitored student behavior; communicated with parents and staff; collaborated with special education to meet modified academic and behavior needs.

experience.title: Assistant Director
experience.description: Opened and closed the school; ensured compliance with state child care and health laws; trained and supervised staff; wrote curriculum for ages two through six; led staff meetings; planned events; communicated with parents; promoted and enrolled students.

experience.title: Youth Advocate
experience.description: Implemented treatment plans for children with various disabilities including autism; worked one-on-one with autistic children; behavior modification, attending skills and social skills; collaborated with a team to develop best treatment approaches; received annual training in Autism Spectrum Disorder, CPR, CPI; worked in community, school, and home settings.

experience.title: Substitute Teacher
experience.description: Implemented and followed the absent teacher's work plan; supervised activities and maintained a safe learning environment.

experience.title: Assistant Store Manager
experience.description: Supported store manager in duties of the kiosk; displayed and sold merchandise; helped achieve store sales goals.
